paper.title: A proof-producing decision procedure for real arithmetic

author.org: Computer Science Department, Carnegie-Mellon University, Pittsburgh, Pa.#TAB#

paper.abstract: We present a fully proof-producing implementation of a quantifier elimination procedure for real closed fields. To our knowledge, this is the first generally useful proof-producing implementation of such an algorithm. While many problems within the domain are intractable, we demonstrate convincing examples of its value in interactive theorem proving.
